title: The Stuxnet Worm
description: A 60-second lesson on The Stuxnet Worm.

hook.text: In 2010, centrifuges at Iran's nuclear facility started spinning themselves to destruction.

buildup.text: A worm called Stuxnet targeted specific industrial controllers made by Siemens.

discovery.text: It sabotaged centrifuge speeds while sending normal readings to operators. They saw nothing wrong.

twist.text: Stuxnet was likely built by the US and Israel â€” the first known cyber weapon used against a nation.

climax.text: Software crossed from the digital world into physical destruction for the first time.

punchline.text: Code became a weapon of war.
